name: The Weary Traveler
description:
Welcome to the Kingdom of Dabloonia!

The Weary Traveler takes you, the player, through a magical portal into the Kingdom of Dabloonia, - a world where animals talk and trade with golden coins known as dabloons! Do crime, get crimed, and talk to various characters. 

💰 How many dabloons richer will you end up being? 💰

NOTE: All copyright is for my work only. Any art or assets used are sourced from the Internet and I do not own it. Please do not repost my work. This was a project for school and I thought this would be a fun addition to my portfolio. Thanks! 

Inspired by the TikTok Dabloons Meme Trend comes The Weary Traveler with the honor-based mechanics created by the trend and the Dabloons community.
